ModMetaData.name: Disallow Body Types
ModMetaData.author: Xenofell
ModMetaData.description:
This mod enables you to disallow pawns to be generated with one or more body types. By default, none are disallowed - you can, and must, configure this mod through the mod settings window if you want it to do anything!
Source code: https://github.com/cstamford/RimWorld_DisallowBodyTypes
